required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double Masked, Parallel-Group, Vehicle-Controlled, Clinical Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution in Subjects With Dry Eye Disease
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-Center, Phase 2b, Randomized, Double Masked, Parallel-Group, Vehicle-Controlled, Clinical Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25% and 0.1%) Compared to Vehicle in Subjects With Dry Eye Disease

brief_summary.textblock: A Multi-Center, Phase 2b, Randomized, Double Masked, Parallel-Group, Vehicle-Controlled, Clinical Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25% and 0.1%) Compared to Vehicle in Subjects with Dry Eye Disease

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Assess safety and tolerability of reproxalap formulations using adverse event query.
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the safety and tolerability of reproxalap formulations in subjects with dry eye syndrome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of reproxalap on Lissamine green staining using the Ora Calibra® scale.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate lissamine green staining of reproxalap in subjects with dry eye syndrome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of reproxalap on fluorescein staining using the Ora Calibra® scale.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate fluorescein staining of reproxalap in subjects with dry eye syndrome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of reproxalap on tear film break-up time (TFBUT©).
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate tear film break-up time of reproxalap in subjects with dry eye syndrome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of reproxalap on ocular discomfort using the Ora Calibra® Ocular Discomfort scale
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the symptoms of reproxalap on ocular discomfort in subjects with dry eye syndrome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of reproxalap on dry eye syndrome using the Ocular Surface and Disease Index (OSDI) © questionnaire.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the symptoms of reproxalp in subjects with dry eye syndrome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of reproxalap on dry eye syndrome symptoms using the Symptom Assessment in Dry Eye (SANDE) scale.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the dry eye symptoms of reproxalap in subjects with dry eye syndrome.

intervention.description: Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25%) administered for approximately twelve weeks.
Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.1%) administered for approximately twelve weeks.
Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution administered for approximately twelve weeks.
